description.narrative: By 2025, out of school girls and boys, with a focus on the most disadvantaged and those affected by humanitarian situations access education and skills development programmes., which contributes to Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equitable Access To Quality Education (Covid), Learning Outcomes, Skills Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 'By 2025, girls and boys in Ethiopia, in particular the most disadvantaged and those affected by humanitarian situations, benefit from an equitable and resilient education system enabling them to acquire relevant knowledge and skills.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
